FirstBlock.content:
We all don’t like to talk about bad things, we got it.
But the reality is that 1 of 3 social media account  was hacked and lost their digital content forever.
FirstBlock.text1: Our mission is to bring more care through honest, fair financing. We are here to reduce stress during difficult times and enjoy financial security.
FirstBlock.text2: Our insurance pays a proportion of your lost earnings to help you pay for your lifestyle, traveling, food, enabling you to focus on what really matters.

SecondBlock.title: Apply for a digital income insurance from Attina
SecondBlock.content: Just share the link to your account and choose the amount of monthly coverage. Fair and fully digital.

SecondBlock.title: Start your coverage and do what you do best
SecondBlock.content: With our instant payouts we will not let your income drop and to prevent any cyber problems we will provide as much useful information as possible.

SecondBlock.title: Make a hassle-free claim and get refund instantly
SecondBlock.content: Click Claim on the main page and describe in form what happend. After we check it, you'll receive a payout for any your needs like shopping or hobbies.

ThirdBlock: Insuring your income is the most practical thing you can do to empower your future.
FourthBlock: I believe that everyone can feel safe on the Internet like in their homes.
FifthBlock: Our founder previously advised companies on security of digital assets. But more requests began to come from people of the new economy: streamers, influencers, crypto investors and others. Determined to make care accessible for everyone, he founded Attina.

SixthBlock.title: Our Customer Values
SixthBlock.subtitle: We have set ourselves a number of values which help guide everyone in our team in how they should make decisions.

content.title: Continuous Learning
content.text: Cyber literacy and cyber hygiene — the skills that we try to develop in our clients. It's like healthy eating: you have to constantly learn new things about yourself to stay on track.

content.title: Customer First
content.text: We make decisions in a way that bears the world around us in mind. We work in a rapidly changing world and we must be ready to take on all the responsibility and risks as pioneers of insurance for digital content. And yes, we do.

content.title: Be Responsible
content.text: We will only build things that make our customers' lives better. We'll always talk to our community of customers to stay on top of what that is.

content.title: Keep getting better
content.text: We believe that every single element of our business can keep getting better. At the forefront of innovation, we stay interested in everything that can make us be greater.

SeventhBlock.title: Built for Everyone
SeventhBlock.text_1: Everyone deserves the opportunity to protect their quality of life and their future, which is why we've made our Digital Income Insurance so simple and accessible.
SeventhBlock.text_2: Our products was created to fit every budget and lifestyle.
